data.text: Xili fanyi fan dangi labundɛ fanyi ra.
Sofe kaaɲɛ banxi fisa sofe xulun banxi bɛ,
Sunnunyi fisa yele bɛ,
Xaxilima a ɲɔxɔ rasigama nɛ faxɛ ma,
Xaxilima xa xurui fisa xaxilitare xa matɔxɔɛ bɛ.
Xaxilitare xa yele luxi nɛ
Kɔbiri tinxintare a niyama nɛ xaxilima xa findi xaxilitare ra,
Fe raɲɔnyi fisa a fɔlɛ bɛ.
I bɔɲɛ naxa gbata tede,
I naxa lu a fala ra,
Xaxilimaya luxi nɛ alɔ kɛ,
Xaxilimaya findixi mixi xa kantari nan na,
Ala xa wali mato.
I xa sɛɛwa hɛɛri tɛmui.
N ma simaya fufafu kui,
I naxa i yɛtɛ findi tinxintɔɛ ra,
I naxa findi tinxintare ra,
A lanma i xa i ɲɔxɔ sa na marasi firinyi xɔn ma.
Xaxilima xa xaxilimaya a sɛnbɛ gboma nɛ dangi taa mangɛ fu ra.
Tinxintɔɛ mu na yi duniɲa ma,
I naxa i tuli mati mixi xa wɔyɛnyi birin na,
alɔ i tan yati bara a raba sanya wuyaxi mixie ra.
N na birin igbɛxi nɛ xaxilimaya ra.
Xaxilimaya tan tilin, a makuya won na,
Na kui n naxa kata na kolonde,
N bara fe nde to naxan xɔnɔ dangi faxɛ ra.
N tan kawandila yi nan to n ma fe matoxi birin kui:
N naxa xɛmɛ tinxinxi keren to xɛmɛ wulu ya ma,
N yi nan gbansan to kɔrɛ:
